name: PUNKS Comic
description: Issue #1 of PUNKS Comic (https://opensea.io/collection/punks-comic) was released on May 10th, 2021 with 10,000 NFTs at 0.2ETH each. With only 3,313 NFTs remaining after a series of decisions to burn their NFTs, Issue #1 holders now have the ability to stake their comic NFT for fractional ownership in the 16 CryptoPunks depicted in the story. The 16 CryptoPunks that the main comic characters are based on have been bundled, secured, and fractionalized into 100 million tokens (https://fractional.art/vaults/punks). Owners of PUNKS Comic, Issue #1 are currently staking their NFT in exchange for 50% (50 million) of the total PUNKS token supply over the course of 24 months.
